title: The Morning Wrap You’ll Fall in Love With
excerpt: Have you been looking for a new and yummy breakfast meal? Well look no further, because Chino Valley Ranchers is cooking up the perfect recipe – a delicious morning wrap!
author: Chino Valley Ranchers
content:
Have you been looking for a new and yummy breakfast meal? Well look no further, because Chino Valley Ranchers is cooking up the perfect recipe – a delicious morning wrap!

Breakfast wraps are the perfect dish for anyone who has a busy schedule and must take their meal “to go”. With all of the yummy and nutritious ingredients wrapped inside a tortilla, you’ll question how you ever got through the morning without them! To learn more about our morning wrap recipe, continue reading or watch the video above!

What You’ll Need:

  • Olive oil
  • Chino Valley Ranchers’ eggs
  • Salt
  • Pepper
  • Your choice of cheese
  • Diced green chilies
  • Tortillas

1. Cook your eggs.

Start off by pouring a tablespoon of olive oil onto a medium-sized skillet over a stovetop. Crack your Chino Valley Ranchers’ eggs into a bowl and then transfer them onto the heated skillet. Let them cook and move them around for a bit. For some extra flavor, add salt and pepper to your liking.

2. Time for cheese.

After letting the eggs cook for a while, it’s time to add 3/8 cup of your favorite type of cheese to the skillet. Mix the egg and cheese together.

3. Add some spice with green chilies.

To give the wrap a bit more flavor, this recipe calls for diced green chilies. Once the cheese and eggs have cooked for a bit, sprinkle in the diced chilies to your liking.

4. Prepare the tortillas.

The wrap’s tortilla is very important, as its job is to literally hold the meal all together. To make sure everything turns out as planned, take out another skillet and heat the tortilla on both sides until it becomes fluffy.

5. Put it all together.

Once all of the ingredients are just the way you like it, scoop the egg, cheese and chili mixture onto the tortillas. Then, securely wrap each tortilla.

And in just five simple steps, you have yourself a delicious, on-the-go morning wrap! To make this meal taste its best, be sure to use Chino Valley Ranchers’ eggs, as we only produce the best-tasting and highest quality products. For more information on our eggs, contact us today!
